Body:
passphrase = 'test'
expected_credential = 'credential'
credential_holder = CredentialHolder(passphrase, expected_credential)
serialized_credential_holder = (CredentialHolderSerializer.
    serialize_credential_holder(credential_holder))
new_credential_holder = (CredentialHolderSerializer.
    deserialize_credential_holder(serialized_credential_holder))
actual_credential = new_credential_holder.get_credential(passphrase)
assert actual_credential == expected_credential
